headline: Is KKR’s Rapid Multi Year Surge Still Justified After Recent Valuation Concerns?
summary: Wondering if KKR at around $131.98 is still a smart buy or if the big gains are already behind it? Let us unpack what the market might be pricing in and whether that lines up with the fundamentals. The stock has been choppy lately, down 7.6% over the last week but still up 15.6% over the past month, even though it is currently down 11.5% year to date and 7.5% over the last year. Zoom out further and the story brightens, with returns of 189.8% over 3 years and 246.2% over 5 years. Behind...

headline: KKR Announces Intra-Quarter Monetization Activity Update for the Fourth Quarter
summary: NEW YORK, December 19, 2025--KKR today announced income from monetization activity in excess of $525 million with respect to the period from October 1, 2025 through December 19, 2025 based on information available as of today. The quarter-to-date monetization activity is made up of approximately 95% realized performance income and approximately 5% realized investment income.
